member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader
member.summary: Represents a single host header entry.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.HostName
member.summary: Gets the host-name associated with this entry.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.IPAddress
member.summary: Gets the IP-address associated with this entry.

member.name: P:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.Port
member.summary: Gets the port associated with this entry.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of an object.
member.param: Host-name to be associated with the new entry.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of an object.
member.param: Host-name to be associated with the new entry.
Port number to be associated with the new entry.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of an object.
member.param: Host-name to be associated with the new entry.
Port number to be associated with the new entry.
IP-address to be associated with the new entry.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the entry.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.GetHostHeaders
member.summary: Gets all host headers configured for the current web-site.

member.summary: Gets all host headers configured for specified web-site.

member.summary: Adds new host header to the current web-site.

member.param: The host-name of the new host header.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.Add(Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader,Microsoft.Web.Administration.Site)
member.summary: Adds new host header to specified web-site.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes specified host header from the current web-site.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader.Remove(Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeader,Microsoft.Web.Administration.Site)
member.summary: Removes specified host header from specified web-site.

member.name: T:Dynamicweb.Hosting.HostHeaderCollection

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the solutin is running on a 64 bit application pool.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current application pool (IIS 7 or 8) is running in integrated pipeline.
member.value: true if application pool is running in integrated; otherwise, false.
